entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then flurries at times heavy beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
